sentences.en: And working parents have to juggle day care, jobs and family.
sentences.cn: 父母需要变着戏法般地平衡每天的日托, 工作和家庭的关系.

sentences.en: Auto makers, as is often the case , must juggle competing demands.
sentences.cn: 汽车制造商往往需要满足顾客各种互相冲突的需求.

sentences.en: Does it only take five hours of sleep to fuel the juggle?
sentences.cn: 只睡五个小时就够补充精力了 吗 ?
不要在你的帐目上搞鬼.

sentences.en: Han Lingsha: Do you juggle me?
sentences.cn: 韩菱纱: 你耍我 呢 ?

sentences.en: If you juggle with your accounts, you'll get into trouble.
sentences.cn: 你要是在帐目上做手脚, 你可要遇到麻烦了.

sentences.en: Juggle the balls as long as you can, avoiding any ball collisions.
sentences.cn: 变戏法的球,只要你能, 避免任何球碰撞.

sentences.en: Many working couples find it hard juggle work and family life.
sentences.cn: 很多上班族夫妻发现要巧妙地安排工作和家庭生活是很困难的.

sentences.en: She had to juggle her job and her children.
Soon she was juggling five eggs.
sentences.cn: 很快她就在抛接5个鸡蛋了。

sentences.en: The finance department will juggle a few of the delinquent accounts.
sentences.cn: 财务部会篡改一些拖欠账户.

sentences.en: The management team meets several times a week to juggle budgets and resources.
sentences.cn: 管理团队一周碰头几次，以同时兼顾预算和资源。

sentences.en: When did you learn to juggle?

words.tran_cn: 欺诈的；变戏法的；欺骗的

trans.tran_cn: 玩杂耍，尽力同时应付，尽量兼顾，虚报
trans.tran_en: to keep three or more objects moving through the air by throwing and catching them very quickly
to keep three or more objects moving through the air by throwing and catching them very quickly
